the length of e is  999


x= 401298280658641433089021727195318373797424594523914887789


b0= -


e*r-x*phi-s= 0




alpha= 0.9983
delta= 0.1898
epsilon= 0.4931
gamma= 0.1848


To check that 1-0.5*gamma-2*epsilon<delta<1-0.5*gamma-sqrt(alpha*epsilon), the answer must be true


True


1-0.5*gamma-2*epsilon= -0.07866


delta= 0.1898


1-0.5*gamma-sqrt(alpha*epsilon)= 0.2060


To check that epsilon<alpha<4*epsilon the answer must be true


True


epsilon= 0.4931


alpha= 0.9983


4*epsilon= 1.973


To check that |s|<inf(|er|,xu), the answer must be true


True


|s|= 41107572576822205277395070873956074574882968616505711849

theta at the root (z1,z4) modulo e must be zero


Mod(theta(z1,z4),e)= 0

d=
